ygData.msgSnippet: Halucigen looked to FZ.  Right, I will be, you have shown me how powerful you are, and I now follow you.  Can you show me around.  I must know what base looks

Halucigen looked to FZ.  "Right, I will be, you have shown me how powerful you are, and I now follow you.  Can you show me around.  I must know what base looks like from above."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> After Halucigen had looked around something struck him.  One of 
> the messages he had saw while in FZ's mind.  To a certain bot, 
> and a shuttle going to get him.  If Halucigen could get to the shield 
> as the shuttle came through he would be able to slip through and 
> out.  A perfect plan.
